welcome_message_title: Welcome to South San Jose Hills
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South San Jose Hills, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. Get ready to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and chartered aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport, providing services for general aviation and private aircraft.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Whiteman Airport, primarily used for flight training and aircraft storage.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and surrounding areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport is where most commercial flights arrive and depart from.

terminals.name: Thomas F. Riley Terminal
terminals.description: The Thomas F. Riley Terminal is a smaller terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Alaska Airlines and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for major airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at LAX.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving mainly Southwest Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly Delta Air Lines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving mainly Delta Air Lines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving mainly American Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving mainly American Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving mainly Alaska Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving mainly United Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving mainly United Airlines and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
